en.name: Jewelry POS
en.summary: I create a Java application to manage and sell jewelry. This project is group work in OOP II (Programming course). And later on, I refactor and update some of the code in the program.

highlights.1: Design POS application which runs by JVM
highlights.2: Implemented system by following MVC architecture
highlights.3: Supported application for both customer self-use and seller
highlights.4: Implement a configurable database and products
